title: Basic Life Support (BLS) Online Training: Blended Learning-Based Adult Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic first aid concepts and foundational human physiology knowledge
context.additional_context: Moodle platform integration with expert-verified content and practical simulation tools

learning_goals: In adult cardiac arrest situations, learners will accurately identify chest compression locations within 10 seconds.
According to BLS algorithms, learners will perform correct chest compressions consecutively for at least five cycles in 1 minute and 30 seconds.
Learners will explain automated external defibrillator (AED) usage procedures step-by-step and apply them practically within 3 minutes.
By achieving over 85% on online module assessments, learners will demonstrate mastery of core knowledge.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
